repnme.cdata!:
Hungary - Industrial Export and
            Restructuring Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objectives of the Industrial
            Export Restructuring Project are to support the
            Government's programs for industrial restructuring and
            export expansion and to strengthen the development banking
            role of the National Bank of Hungary. The project consists
            of: (a) a credit package which would be onlent by NBH to
            finance the foreign exchange costs of about 15
            export-oriented and industrial restructuring subprojects
            which have been identified and preappraised by the Bank; (b)
            two credit lines to NBH, one for export promotion and the
            other for industrial restructuring to help finance between
            20 and 27 subprojects meeting agreed eligibility criteria;
            and (c) expert and advisory srvices required for carrying
            out three subsectoral development strategy studies, the
            feasibility study of a chemical project, and institutional
            strengthening of NBH.
